website_summaries.verdict: Fully decked out to deliver years of fast-paced fun, this all-terrain dune racer will grow with your child and even offers room for siblings or friends.
pros: Parent-controlled max speed lockout and an automatic pedal release braking system provide extra safety
Rugged tires with powerful traction take on just about any terrain
Features under-the-hood storage for treasured items and essentials
Rugged construction can take a beating
cons: If you're not mechanically inclined, assembly can take some effort

customer_reviews.title: reasons he said it’s super fast, he likes it can do reverse
customer_reviews.text: My son have to push the five star , reasons he said it’s super fast, he likes it can do reverse ,his learning to drive early , no license needed , he drive with his brother who don’t want to get off , it does not get stuck in the grass , assembly is fine I have to do it ( mom ) by myself at late night I successfully done it by at least 45 minutes , I’m kind a proud ( x-fingers)
customer_reviews.author: Maganda at Gwapo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This vehicle works very, very well! Both my 3 and 5 year old grandsons can ride in it at the same time, and it goes up the steep hill where we live with both of them in it. And my 3-year-old grandson can operate it by himself (if his brother lets him). If there's a problem, it's that they will drive away into the woods without me. So far it has handled sandy, gravelly, and grassy terrain with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewQ

customer_reviews.title: Handles rough terrain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vehicle for my grandsons, ages 5 and 2. They love it. We live in the country and I wanted something that could handle the rough terrain and that the two boys could ride together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have a hilly backyard and it does a pretty good job going up the hills
customer_reviews.text: After lots of research I purchased this power wheels. We have a hilly backyard and it does a pretty good job going up the hills. Easy to steer and battery works well. My 2 year old and 6 old both love to drive it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The car is stiff and not so fun to drive
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is flimsy, one of the wheels is coming off all the time. The cap around the shifting stick that guides the change of gear broke after one day. The car is stiff and not so fun to drive. We have another car, one of those Jeep cars who is 3 yrs old, had stayed outside and was driven by all the kids in the neighborhood and is still faster and sturdier than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mami

customer_reviews.title: Drives great on grass
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a Christmas gift for my Son. It doesn’t come assembled (same can be said for any other vendor unless you pay assembly); it took my husband about an hour to put together . Drives great on grass; a bit slower on the sidewalk but really fun and cute overall. Also, it’s big inside- i can sit in it!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A.

customer_reviews.title: Great car, bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Really fun car, and even my 3 year old loves it and has gotten really good at it! Minus one star for customer service. We had a problem with the “gear shift,” where the car would only go in reverse. I emailed the company, but I never got any response. Eventually my husband was able to loosen some screws and make it work. Also, the hubcaps are made very cheaply and they have all fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: Orna Drawas

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for little ones. Needs longer battery life.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our little boy’s 4th Birthday. He absolutely loves it. It is good at going through the grass on our slightly sloped yard. The short battery life just doesn’t give him long to enjoy it and then needs half a day to charge before it’s ready to go again. We like this product overall.
customer_reviews.author: jacksmom2014

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this car!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5yr old absolutely loves this car! He’s short so he kind of has to lay / stretch to reach the gas pedal but he’s found a way to make it work lol. It has 2 speeds (2.5 & 5mph) & reverse...he’ll only drive in the top speed. He has a good grasp of when to use reverse & can get himself unstuck from most situations. If you’re thinking about getting this for your kids...do it! They will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ever!!! It goes on sand, dirt, sidewalk, grass, street! My 4 1/2 year old grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Speck

customer_reviews.title: PW HOT ROD UNDERGROUND
customer_reviews.text: Got this for 4 yo grandson. Tall and thin. He absolutely loves this thing. Can’t keep him out of it. Durability so far is great. I’m surprised the battery still holds good charge after a year. Still recommend a back up if it will be driven like ours is! Hard plastic tires are less than ideal in some surfaces, but I’ve heard you can buy rubber sleeves from the PW Hot Rod underground. In short, good quality PW, kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my two boys, ages 5 and 3. Works so well. I’m very impressed. Battery lasts longer than I expected. The low speed is perfect for training, because at first the kids want to play bumper cars. It took me days of training to get past that. But now they have fun with high speed. It’s not too fast; just right. Do not underestimate the assembly time. But it’s worth it. Clear instructions, and everything fit as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome christmas gift, my little boy was beside himself. The tires do wear down quickly on pavement!
customer_reviews.author: Jay C.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly under powered but a nice toy in general.
customer_reviews.text: I like the dune buggy and Im glad my kids can ride together but I find it grossly underpowered. It's approximately half as fast as the little red tractor I bought my son from here. I gather that there are 2 children riding but I believe that the vehicle should be powered appropriately. Perhaps 24v would be better than 12v. Oh well, its nice seeing the kids ride together now.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color, Slow.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered green and got pink. I just spray painted it with a desert camp look. Extremely slow. We’ve owned a couple of 12v Peg Perego’s and they are much faster.
customer_reviews.author: joshua branham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this car. Very durable with a lot of power and the battery lasts a long time. We have 11 acres and he does laps around it. I've only had it die in the middle of the yard once. he typically is done riding it around before the battery dies. Would recommend this car. Also, no dashboard so their knees will fit better. Kid will probably mentally outgrow this car before physically outgrowing it.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl H

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. Wife can drive it.
customer_reviews.text: 135 lb weight limit. 12 volts. Two seater . 5 mile an hour top speed . Battery seem to last forever. Kids love it. I have a 2 and a one you're old. I put a pillow behind the two-year-old so he can reach the pedal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: THIS is the motorized vehicle you’ve been looking for! We did hours of research before purchasing and it really paid off. My boys adore this! Even my 8 year old can drive it (as well as my 3 year old!). Our backyard is very hilly and it’s able to navigate the hills with a decently charged battery - when it can’t climb the hills we know it’s time to charge! Large enough for two kids to sit comfortably at once. You’ll be glad you chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: mamasubers

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my then 2 year old daughter as the price was great but she wasn’t big enough to use it until she turned three. I have not had any issues with the battery as I charge it after it’s used and I disconnect it from the buggy when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Victor Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Best Power Wheels car to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than Power Wheels we've bought in the past! I would suggest to the manufacturer to make the shifters on all of their models a little sturdier possibly out of metal but other than that this is a great little car my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Werner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for less then 4 months and already it is broken and doesnt work. We have taken great care of it, stored it in the garage etc...it no longer works at all. We ordered a new battery and plug and it isnt that. This is a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Caso

customer_reviews.title: You don’t get what you see in description!!!
customer_reviews.text: You won’t get what you see on the pictures. The item on the pictures is a slightly larger model than what you get. Didn’t bother returning it cause my son has already opened the box when I got home.
customer_reviews.author: Tam2005

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My three year old grandson loves it. He needs a back pillow to reach the peddle but he can drive it well (at low speed). It is a chore to put together. You need to invest in an electric screw driver. It took several hours by hand.
customer_reviews.author: HornyToad

customer_reviews.title: Totally unhappy!
customer_reviews.text: They review my review. Put it on there Amazon. This car is NOT what you will get. If you want this car FLR09 you will get the FLM96.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great ride for my sons ages 1-5
customer_reviews.text: My sons ages 1-5 love this car. I bought an extra battery because they literally will ride these all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Tons o' fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great for our large yard and handles bumpy terrain very well! Kids aged 6 and 3 love it! Just remember to "unlock" the faster speed gear for even more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Joe F.

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to operate. Grandkids love it. They are 3 & 2 and fit very comfortably. Drives very well on grass, gravel and concrete. There was more assembly required than I had hoped for but not difficult at all. Just need a Phillips screwdriver and pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Kids car
customer_reviews.text: Runs well , lots of parts but follow the directions and it goes ok .
customer_reviews.author: Art Vanderlay

customer_reviews.title: The best for off-road and grassy areas
customer_reviews.text: Omg in love with this car !! My boys love it so much
customer_reviews.author: LOVEALWAYS

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: My 7.5 year old loves it. Great for driveway and yard driving fun. Without causing damage to either.
customer_reviews.author: IheartAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's 6th birthday. He lover it and drove it every day this summer. Battery stays charged for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: We got this item put it together and waited patiently for the grandsons to visit for the weekend. They came and at first it worked fine but then it would run for maybe 10 minutes then it would stop. It would start up again in about 20 minutes and repeat the same thing the boys was very sad over this. I had to take it back apart and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy hayes

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves this
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this and its a hit with the other children in the neighborhood. We had the speed set to slow when he first started driving but increased it later on. Mainly, because I imagined him driving like Dale Earnhardt Jr. Overall i'm happy with the purchase and more importantly, so is my kid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material. Loud hard plastic wheels. Poor package. It takes some time to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No Battery. Package damaged. can't get all items in the damaged box.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Sporty kids car
customer_reviews.text: Cute! And appears to be built well. My son likes to ride it. Today is the first day actually. The battery came in charged so that was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rusbel

customer_reviews.title: This dune racer has been awesome! No trouble on the grass or going up ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a large yard with lots of hills. This dune racer has been awesome! No trouble on the grass or going up the hills. My 3 year old is loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Tai A

customer_reviews.title: overall its pretty good
customer_reviews.text: assembly was kinda terrible. lot of parts not lining up, wish the battery life was a little longer. seems like a half hour of use and its dead. but the kids love it and i guess thats all that really matters
customer_reviews.author: Alea Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this thing!!! You have to assemble it, but it’s pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my grandson. He loves it. Very easy to put together, durable,great battery life. One thing that would be a big plus is if you would put thin strips of rubber on the tires. They tend to spin easily on hard surfaces. Great on grass and hills.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Green

customer_reviews.title: Power Wheels are the BEST.
customer_reviews.text: Great vehicle. Easy to assemble. We have owned a PW Mustang for three years and they are workhorses.
customer_reviews.author: HBern

customer_reviews.title: Don’t turn wheel too hard disengaged
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it Steering column could be better Wish I could control steering he becomes apprehensive when turning
customer_reviews.author: Debbie hoge

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it. It’s not as fast as I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. It’s not as fast as I thought it would be but it’s pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Boys love it
customer_reviews.text: Great starter car for my 2 1/2 and 4 1/2 year old boys.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkying

customer_reviews.title: Quality was most important to me.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew, he loved it and drove it all day, thank goodness I bought an extra battery. Great price, and quality, but color is a lime green not the green advertisement shows. All in all good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product Great customer service, came with 1 wrong part, but Mattel overnight shipped it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Crod

customer_reviews.title: Fun But battery drains fast
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot of fun I wish the battery though stayed charged a little longer
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Huling

customer_reviews.title: DUNE BUGGY
customer_reviews.text: KIDS LOVE IT AND IT DOES EXACTLY WHAT THE ADVERT CLAIMS FANTASTIC VALUE MY ADVICE BUY A SPARE BATTERY COS ONCE YOUR KIDS GET INVOLVED WITH THIS THE FUN GOES ON UNTIL THE BATTERY GOES FLAT AND ITS HANDY TO HAVE ONE ALREADY CHARGED AND READY TO GO AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Battery requires 18 hours for initial charge.
customer_reviews.text: So plan ahead. Kids bummed to get a fun new toy they can't use immediately. Took 2 hours to unpack & assemble. Instructions clear with detailed images.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goes just as fast with 2 kids. No slow downs.
customer_reviews.author: martha perkins

customer_reviews.title: Go cart
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved it. Something for them to play with while here
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the picture shown
customer_reviews.text: We like the racer but it is not the same as what they show in the picture. It is a lighter green and the side front decals are not black. Kids love it but I specifically ordered this one (and paid a bit more) because it was a darker green and black. Go to Wal-Mart and you can get the same racer they sent me for $200.00. I paid $270.00. thinking I was getting what was shown. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It came missing the steering column. The metal rod that connects the steering wheel to the front axel is missing. Would like the piece as opposed to returning the entire item.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Selvidio

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this! Goes on grass and curbs lol. I’ve even got in it and had a little fun. Glad I got it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that two small children could ride it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: very cute, but way too slow. virtually barely moves. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old loves it! Easy to charge and very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: GinaBina

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little on the slow side and doesn’t have seat belts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BROKE IN 3 WEEKS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons birthday, hoping it’d get tons of use over the summer. A motor went out on it in 3 weeks. Not happy AT ALL. For this being so expensive it didn’t last long. It hardly got any use and now it’s broken
customer_reviews.author: Jason Vardon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came in with a cracked battery but have to return the whole car back for a refund?
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Christmas disaster
customer_reviews.text: Gave to daughter for Christmas. After less then five minutes of use, the properly assembled wire clip cracked off wheel and hub cap separated from wheel. Of course, customer service is closed for Christmas. Will be calling first thing tomorrow. Massive Christmas fail. Daughter was devatated.
customer_reviews.author: Gurdip

customer_reviews.title: FUN, FUN, FUN
customer_reviews.text: We live in the country and our backyard is mostly grass, dirt, and rocks. I was worried this Dune Racer would not do well on those types of surfaces, but it does GREAT! We haven't had any problems-It goes just about every where and my 4 year old son loves it!!! Such a fun childhood toy that will help create lots of memories! Set up takes about 40 mins with 2 people, but it isn't too difficult!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Bitter

product_meta.title: Power Wheels Dune Racer, Green
product_meta.description:
Style:GreenYoung drivers can race into all kinds of awesome off-road adventures with the Power Wheels Dune Racer! With a sturdy steel frame, an open cockpit roomy enough for two riders, and a high-performance Monster Traction drive system that can power over different terrains, this rad ride-on is perfect for your little adventurer. There’s even a storage compartment under the hood for toys and other on-the-go necessities. And it features two forward drive speeds (2.5 or 5 mph max.) plus reverse, a 12-volt rechargeable battery, and Power Lock brakes!

BRAND STORY
Power Wheels: The only way to ride. Is your wanna-be driver looking to gain some behind-the-wheel confidence? We’ve got just the right Power Wheels vehicles—and so many new ways to ride—to empower them to hit the road! Kids at our Fisher-Price Play Lab put these vehicles to the test, so you can feel good giving your kid the thrill of independence as they drive off in in their very own ride-on car, truck or ATV. These battery-powered riding toys are built for hours of fun and endless backyard adventures for toddlers to more experienced drivers!
feature_bullets: Sturdy steel frame with flashy “chrome” wheels & grille
Drives 2.5 and 5 mph (4 and 8 km/h) max. forward; 2.5 mph (4 km/h) max. reverse
Monster Traction system drives on hard surfaces, wet grass, and rough terrain

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars175 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
